short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the distance that the user has scrolled across all web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a simple tool that tracks how far a user has scrolled on a webpage and displays that distance in both pixels and feet in a popup window. The user can access this popup window by clicking on the extension icon in the browser's toolbar.

The extension can be useful for anyone who wants to keep track of their progress while reading long articles or web pages. Additionally, seeing the distance in both pixels and feet can provide users with a better sense of scale and help them visualize the amount of content they have gone through.

Overall, the extension is a simple yet helpful tool for anyone who spends a lot of time online and wants to visualize their progress. It is easy to install and use, and can provide users with valuable insights into their habits.
